title: Procurement for the supply of 360,000 Bottles of Human Albumin Solution BP/Ph Eur, 20% in 50ml Bottles
decision_details: - This drug is used for the treatment of patients with various medical conditions and International Competitive Bids have been invited for the purchase of the same. The Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee has recommended the award of the relevant procurement to the lowest evaluated substantially responsive bidder, M/s Baxalta GmbH, Switzerland as per the recommendation of the Technical Evaluation Committee.  Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Health to award the relevant procurement, was approved by the Cabinet.
